attributes.action:
To understand the true cost of
The Brexit ferry cancellation fee to tax payers
attributes.additional_details: To be clear this is not about Brexit but about the fact that all mp’s are accountable to their constituents. More important, tax payer money should always be disclosed. If there has been a deal using tax payers money to cancel the Brexit ferry’s this should be a transparent process and disclosed.
attributes.background: Tax payers should know exactly where their money is spent and it is unacceptable that Chris Grayling will not give visibility of the cancellation fee of Brexit ferry’s. This is unacceptable. Tax payer money expenditure should be transparent

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about the cost of cancelling a contract but we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
